creditline: Lent by Richard and Diana Rose
description: white; round base designed to sit on floor, tapers as rises up vertically; expandable tubing tower rises up from base; hang-up switch in cradle arm that extends off to PL side and holds hand set hanging; hand set attaches with white spiral cord; round key pad sits atop expandable tubing horizontally; electrical cord to plug into wall attaches underneath base; hand set arrived detached
title: "Expansion" model EP-1 push-button telephone
